profiles.name: advanced_coding
profiles.description: Generates code changes based on detailed step instructions.
profiles.purpose: Executes coding operations in the `/code` command, applying modifications step by step.

profiles.name: advanced_reasoning
profiles.description: Performs deep reasoning for task analysis and planning.
profiles.purpose: Used in both `/init` and `/code` to analyze user tasks, request files, generate plans, and build project overviews.

profiles.name: quick_reasoning
profiles.description: Provides fast reformatting of malformed file‐request messages.
profiles.purpose: Salvages and normalizes a bad get‑files response in the `/code` workflow so it can be parsed.

profiles.name: intermediate_reasoning
profiles.description: Handles intermediate‐level file summarization and validation.
profiles.purpose: Used to summarize project files during `/init`. Performs final file structure validation `/code`.
